snippet: A Massachusetts police chief says his officers are cracking down on people who fraudulently use parking spaces for the disabled at Gillette Stadium....
lead_paragraph: A Massachusetts police chief says his officers are cracking down on people who fraudulently use parking spaces for the disabled at Gillette Stadium.

headline.main: Police to Ensure Pats Fans Aren't Abusing Handicapped Spots
headline.print_headline: Police to Ensure Pats Fans Aren't Abusing Handicapped Spots
